item.title: PTCL IPTV :: SmartTV
item.description: PTCL has moved to a soft launch phase for their iptv product , and are calling PTCL DSL subscribers and offering them free IPTV connections ( NO charges for the Set Top Box + Service ) until commercial launch, they are currently advertising 101 channels along with the ability to rewind Geo News , HBO , ESPN and a couple of other channels. I got a call yesterday and have subscribed for smartTV , letâ€™s see how the installation goes.
